record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2663, S. 2664, AND S. 2665
record.narrative:
MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2663, S. 2664, AND S. 2665 -- (Senate - February 26, 2008)

[Page: S1149]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I believe there are three bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title for the second time.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2663) to reform the Consumer Product Safety Commission to provide greater protection for children
A bill (S. 2664) to extend the provisions of the Protect America Act of 2007.
A bill (S. 2665) to extend the provisions of the Protect America Act of 2007 until July 1, 2009.

speaking.paragraph: I object, Mr. President, to any further proceedings with respect to these bills en bloc.
The ACTING PRESIDENT pro temp ore. Objection is heard. The bills will be placed on the calendar.
